title: Synchronous Digital Hierarchy
description: A standardised protocol for transferring multiple digital bit streams synchronously over optical fibre. SDH is used worldwide,with the exception of the US and Canada.

title: Dense Wavelength Division Multiplexing
description: A technology that multiplexes a number of optical carrier signals onto a single optical fibre by using different wavelengths.

title: Time Division Multiplexing
description: A technology that multiplexes a number of optical carrier signals onto a single optical fibre by using different arrival times.

title: Synchronous Optical Networking
description: A standardised protocol for transferring multiple digital bit streams synchronously over optical fibre. SONET is used in the US and Canada.
